name: Lorri Stephans
text: Awesome crew...educated and helpful and friendly yet professional!  Very happy with the food! Was so happy I even spoke with the manager! Super great job you guys! Your for sure my new pizza place! Thank you!

name: spence023
text: Pizza is always good. and done when they tell you.. Better than the other chain pizza's. Staff has always been friendly and polite.

name: julie
text: Went in today and was greeted by an employee who was not wearing her mask properly. Not only that but the employee was also grabbing food from the bins in the back and eating it!! Iâ€™ve always had good experiences here but after today I do not plan on coming back.

name: Liss Edminister
text: I tried to order online to no avail. When I called I had to give my order twice. Finally at the end of the order he said my discounts could not work because they were not online. On top of that he then said the credit card machine was down â€¦More

name: Kelsey Markel
text: They advertise the wings being coated in sauce. I had a little sauce drizzled over the top of mine. Hardly any!!!! Donâ€™t order the wings.

name: Faith Gray
text: The workers at this Hungry Howieâ€™s are above and beyond. The space was clan, neat and organized. Madison and Calvin were very happy and eager to serve us. They were quick and polite.

name: alexa fowler
text: Calvin and Madison were some of the best employees I have ever seen at any establishment. Incredibly understanding and efficient workers. Will definitely be returning because of their service!

name: XxKaylaThe ChocolatexX
text: I never had a problem here. But the last on I got was burned. I wouldn't have sent that out.

name: Michele Smiley
text: During the middle of a global pandemic, the employees at Hungry Howie's in Howell Michigan are not wearing gloves or masks and are standing less than 6 feet apart!  My family and I are trying to keep our local businesses in operation during â€¦More

name: bella Aeschliman
text: I was having a bad day until I visited HH in Howell! The pizza was delicious and quick, the employees were kind and fun, Calvin and Madison lifted my spirits and I will definitely be returning soon!

name: Craig Zube
text: Ordered gluten free and it wasn't.... then the pizza was suppose to have bacon but literally it came with almost no bacon. The amount that would come on a half a piece was for the whole thing. Very disappointed.

name: PingyPongy
text: Some gripes, had some issues with my subs arriving to my house broken up, called and complained, they fixed it immediately and delivered me more with no additional charge. I like the pizza here, especially the Chicken Bacon ranch, more â€¦More

name: mitchell orlando
text: If i could give negative stars i would. We placed a delivery order tonight at 6:14pm, it is currently 7:41pm an just got off the phone with hungry Howie manager. I refused to pay for an hour and a half delivery after i was told an hour. â€¦More

name: Dawn Bloomfield
text: There crust you can have different flavor on top of it. We chose garlic it was great tasting

name: John Strobel
text: Ordered and paid for order. Then I received a call from someone at HH. They do not deliver to businesses in the howell area. They are tired of giving away free pizza. â€¦More

name: Crystal Strawser
text: I just ordered two pizzas for delivery and the woman who delivered them was very rude. I work at a child care center and between 12-3 the director is in a classroom relieving a teacher for their break so no one is in the office. This woman â€¦More

name: Jason Corbat
text: Best pizza place around. Friendly staff. The pizza is always great. The website is corporate based and the promos they offer have to be exact for you to get them. After many attempts on the website. I called up and ordered the old fashion â€¦More

name: Carol Clark
text: Great food and service

name: Mark Dobb
text: Best in howell

name: Heather Barnett
text: I tried to use the website which advertised a deal for a 99 cent 3 cheeser bread with any order greater than $12. My order came to 12.79. I added the cheese bread. The website shows that the deal is included however only deducts 99 cents. I â€¦More

name: Kayla Golembiewski
text: Usually okay, but got our order tonight and the pizza was so cold! Had to warm it up to eat. Dont expect to pay $30 for cold pizza...  on top of that, we ordered last week (delivery) and the old lady who works there was infuriated because I asked for change!! Like I would tip you $10... I didnt want to tip at all, She was very rude!

name: Lori Sue
text: Sometimes it's awesome.  Sometimes it is not.

name: katrina hiler
text: Never did.love their pizza

name: Weston Hood
text: This Hungry Howies knows whatup. Been here a million times. Grew up eating this here pizza and they've never screwed it up. I've been a loyal customer for like 20 years. I don't even know if this strip mall existed 20 years ago. But I've been eating Hungry Howies for 20 years... that's all I know.

name: Eugene
text: Great friendly service .  food was well cooked and looked even better.. Was made to order and was delicious...

name: Lori Crandall
text: Garlic crust peperroni ham and mushrooms

name: Esteban Rodriguez
text: Mark T the assistant manager is absolutely the best person Iâ€™ve ever dealt with in the retail/sales world. I donâ€™t know what he makes but he needs a raise. There arenâ€™t many caring and compassionate people left in the world like mark. If he ever leaves this place my business will be following him where ever he goes.

name: Diamond
text: Makes us come outside to get the food food arrives cold and i didnt get my change back the delivery driver just left.

name: tom zapfe
text: Would leave no stars if I could wont to deliver to the plant that provides their pop to them and doesn't contact them once the order was placed on line have 5 hungry factory works waiting for a pizza that was never made and canceled.

name: Jeff Bogos
text: For the price... best pizza in Howell. Love their sesame crust pizza. Everyone is super friendly as well

name: James Seech
text: Very friendly and helpful, the counter help was excellent. There was a problem with credit card, i offered to go get cash.  The manager ended up comping us.   This was one best experiences ever!!!

name: Pancho V
text: If you like calling a chain pizza place and not getting a answer this is the spot for you.

name: James Jordan
text: Great pizza and boneless chicken great job

name: nathanfish1998
text: used to be MUCH better. now they cant get a simple "Extra everything" when you order online. must be a new chef, because last time i ordered months ago, they did everything right.

name: Lauren Alm
text: Always fast and order is right! Friendly customer service ! No complaints !

name: Percius Cassius
text: The staff is super helpful. Every time I order from this location the food is always hot and on time. Definitely will order my pizza from here again

name: Thomas Collins
text: Always good. Always hot ðŸ”¥

name: Nelly Nelson
text: Ryan was a great hardworking employee, deserves a promotion

name: Maddy Zyskowski
text: Fast service, great workers and the pizza was great too! Thanks guys!

name: angela zyskowski
text: Great staff always so friendly and fast, and the pizza is always great, thank you so much for being our local pizza place

name: Jade Boo
text: I HATE writing bad reviews, but this was TERRIBLE! they gave my order to the wrong person, and it was obviously touched and torn apart  (my bread sticks) and still gave it to me!!. There was HAIR in my BURNT Howie bread, the pizza was â€¦More

name: Brad Nowlin
text: Good pizza.  Flavor crust for the win.

name: Sharlyn Woods
text: Pizza was great.

name: Ray Tor
text: I come here all the time and staff is always friendly and my food is always hot. Its sad I have to mention that lol. But I love this place. Thanks HH.

name: Rex Dayringer
text: Fantastic pizza and bread at entirely reasonable prices. Wait times are manageable

name: Dylan Nickerson
text: Food is decent, alll though for the price, just go to little ceasers. Don't bother with finding deals, as most of the time they're fake. Even codes listed by hungry homies never work in creating an order.

name: Dj Beulah
text: Everything was great except could have put more banana peppers on the sub

name: Yarn Dragon
text: Good food but nothing special that sets them apart from every other pizza place out there.

name: Janenne Powlison
text: We have ordered Hungry Howies for YEARS !!!  May have ordered our last.  this one was tasteless, cut all crooked....one side had little tiny pieces and the other side had HUGE pieces.  They forgot our flavored crust and I think they changed their crust recipe.  It was HORRIBLE !!!

name: M H
text: We had been ordering from this location without issues for quite some time, other than once when they forgot to bring our bread when they delivered. Just ordered the other night and paid for extra toppings, there were none, hardly any â€¦More

name: Ryan Matta
text: I'm with the person below me I hate and think I've only done this once before where I've actually wrote a bad review. So I order a pizza well done and Chez bread well done. They both arrive the pizza sill has soft under â€¦More

name: Jacob Shaulis
text: Terrible customer service.  Complete order not delivered, called and said they would sent it right back out.  30 minutes later got the rest of order.  Driver said he was sorry and he was hungover.  Called an spoke with manager.  They didn't seem to care and offered me a big $5 off my next order.

name: Immortal
text: Food is fresh. Service is good.

name: Jeffrey Steckelberg
text: Awesome pizza!!! So many to choose from!!!!

name: Erika
text: Good for in a pinch for pizza

name: Crystal Morris
text: Never gets my order wrong.

name: Kim Hytinen
text: 2nd time I've ordered from them and both times pizza delivery has taken 1.5 hours. Pizza is cold by the time it arrives.

name: William Riley
text: Was going often, finally fed up with the service, especially from management. They mess up, don't do anything & then get an attitude with you because they have to work. Deleting app, going to one of the ten other pizza options around. Bye Hungry Howie'sðŸ˜¯

text: Nice people, fast service, great food!
